provider.name: Moonshot
provider.description: Moonshot allows developers and enterprises to build LLM-powered applications.

models.title: Chat Completions
models.description: Portkey supports the chat completions API for Moonshot models

notSupported.promptPlayground: Prompt playground is not supported for Moonshot models

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Use Portkey Python SDK to make text calls to Moonshot chat completions models
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python code for moonshot-v1-16k text call on Moonshot

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Use Portkey Node.js SDK to make text calls to Moonshot chat completions models
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js code for moonshot-v1-16k text call on Moonshot

restAPI.description: Use Portkey's REST API to make text calls to Moonshot chat completions models
restAPI.codeExample: sample rest api code for moonshot-v1-16k text call on Moonshot

openAIPythonSDK.description: Use OpenAI Python SDK to make text calls to Moonshot chat completions models
openAIPythonSDK.codeExample: sample openai SDK python code for moonshot-v1-16k text call on Moonshot

openAINodeSDK.description: Use OpenAI Node.js SDK to make text calls to Moonshot chat completions models
openAINodeSDK.codeExample: sample openai SDK node.js code for moonshot-v1-16k text call on Moonshot

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Moonshot using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Moonshot and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Moonshot API key from the Moonshot website [here](https://www.moonshot.cn/)

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for moonshot-v1-16k chat completions call on Moonshot using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for moonshot-v1-16k chat completions call on Moonshot using virtual key

restAPI.description: Use Portkey's REST API to make text calls to Moonshot chat completions models like moonshot-v1-16k
restAPI.codeExample: sample rest api code for moonshot-v1-16k chat completions call on Moonshot using virtual key

openAIPythonSDK.codeExample: sample openai SDK python code for moonshot-v1-16k chat completions call on Moonshot using virtual key
